greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k=1..inf} 1/(2^k-1)^2.
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 354-361.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
Steven R. Finch, Digital Search Tree Constants [Broken link]
Steven R. Finch, Digital Search Tree Constants [From the Wayback machine]
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Tree Searching
mathematica: RealDigits[ NSum[1/(2^k - 1)^2, {k, 1, Infinity}, PrecisionGoal -> 40, AccuracyGoal -> 40, WorkingPrecision -> 500, NSumTerms -> 50, NSumExtraTerms -> 50]][[1]] (* Peter Bertok (peter(AT)bertok.com), Dec 04 2001 *)
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 2080); x=suminf(k=1, 1/(2^k - 1)^2); for (n=1, 2000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b065443.txt", n, " ", d)) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 19 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 18 2001
ext: More terms from Peter Bertok (peter(AT)bertok.com), Dec 04 2001
